title: Football Prediction Algorithm
description: A web application that predicts football match outcomes using a machine learning model. The frontend is built with React and the backend with Django.

title: Farmer Data Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard to visualize and analyze data for farmers, helping them make informed decisions about crops and resources.

title: Technical SEO Audit Tools
description: A suite of tools built on AWS to perform technical SEO audits on websites, identifying issues and providing recommendations for improvement.

title: Polygon Cleaning
description: A project focused on cleaning and processing geospatial data, specifically polygons, using the QGIS toolset for accurate mapping.
